Medium: One volume from a series of four portfolios, three with twelve prints and one with fourteen prints
Dimensions:
Sheet (each, approx): 11 1/8 x 8 3/4" (28.3 x 22.2 cm) or 8 3/4 x 11 1/8" (22.2 x 28.3 cm)
Prints (comp.): various dimensions
Title: Word Works 1979-1992 including works from the on-going series Roadsigned & Subvertising, from The Sydney Morning
